text: Busaco was a community, now extinct, in Union Township, Miami County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. ==History== A post office was established at Busaco in 1869, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1872. The community was a station on the Lake Erie and Western Railroad. ==References== Category:Geography of Miami County, Indiana Category:Former populated places in Indiana Category:Ghost towns in Indiana
title: Busaco, Indiana
